file_content.text: The Empire's invested decades into this operation. It doesn't end here!
Shut up, Vergost! You're finished.
What are you waiting for? Kill the monster!
Wait! I--I know everything about the Empire's other extermination factories. You can't afford to lose me!
He's bluffing. Kill him!
Don't be fools! Kill me and you've accomplished nothing.
Don't be a fool, Jedi. You know you need me alive.
You're smarter than her, soldier. You need me alive.
She's a fool. Surely you'll earn a reward for my capture.
Kill me, and you'll never find out the truth.
Enjoy Republic custody. You'll spend the rest of your life there.
You're under arrest.
I hope you're right about this.
Leave the decisions to your superiors, girl.
I'll look forward to your interrogation.
That felt good. Great job taking him down.
This is for all those you've murdered!
Die!
No! You can't--!
Serves the scum right. I'll have my men clean up this mess.
On my way here, I saw the bodies of those Imperial captains. Nice work.
I couldn't let them escape in the chaos.
Somebody had to do it.
Well, thanks. Would've hurt the Republic to lose them again.
I tore through them without breaking a sweat.
They were pushovers.
Did a good job of it too. Thanks.
I didn't do it for free.
Guess you're right. Wouldn't want you to think the Republic isn't appreciative.
The Republic troops just contacted me. You've taken the factory, and Kalda--where is she?
Look no further, chief. Your friends sprung me.
And killed Commander Vergost.
And captured Commander Vergost. If you ask me, he'd be better off dead.
Over here, chief. Your buddy sprung me.
Killed Commander Vergost too. Couldn't have done it better myself.
There was nothing but darkness in his heart. I couldn't let him live.
He deserved it.
His mind was full of darkness. Death was the only solution.
He deserved it.
That madman murdered thousands of innocent aliens. He had to die.
He deserved it.
Vergost was mad. Someone had to put him down.
He deserved it.
Guess you're right. Still, we could've used someone who knew the Empire's secrets.
It was nothing.
Don't be modest. Could've used someone with dirt on the Empire, but at least he paid for what he did.
How will you proceed?
We'll comb over the factory, see what Imperial dirt we can dig up.
Captured Commander Vergost too. Should've killed him, if you ask me.
I came here to resolve the situation, not engage in senseless slaying.
Jedi don't kill needlessly.
True, Master Jedi. He's worth more to us alive anyway.
You can learn a great deal from a live captive.
He knows too much to kill.
He's worth more to the Republic alive.
He knows too much to kill.
True. Whatever Imperial secrets he hides, we'll find them.
He's got some priceless information. Think I deserve a finder's fee.
He's too valuable to kill.
Of course. Wouldn't want your actions to go unrewarded.
We're finished.
You're right. Whatever this commander knows, we'll find out.
I didn't ask, idiot.
What? Did you just call me stupid?
Kalda, please! That's enough.
Vergost's worth more alive. We'll squeeze him for everything he knows.
I've got to take off. The factory's survivors are coming in now, and they need my help.
The Evocii are in your debt. You've given us the strength to keep fighting for our home.
Ganuk's right. You should be proud. Now go on... I'll take over from here.
My work's nearly complete. You can't stop me. No one can!
Soon you'll just be one more dead alien I'll add to my count.
My Evocii friends will have to be patient while I destroy you.
You're finished, Vergost. Surrender while you can.
Give up.
My progress can't be slowed. How do I explain this to a Republic lackey?
How can you kill thousands of Evocii?
Why are you doing this?
I'll show you the death machine blueprints, if you're interested.
Aliens are weak and impure, a blight on the galaxy.
I'm carrying out the Emperor's will and gaining key alliances. This is only the beginning.
What's the Empire planning? You're going to start killing aliens on other planets?
The beginning of what?
Enough! When I present my victims to the Emperor, your body will top the pile.
An entire Republic battalion's outside, waiting to attack. Stop this!
[Lie.] You're surrounded.
Your supporters are few and weak. I'll exterminate them too, once I'm through with you.
Enough of this! [Attack]
I'll kill you first. [Attack]
As foolish as you are stupid. I'm going to enjoy this.
We could use your help in Shadow Town. If you're interested, look up Zan Loren. He's with the SIS.
